description: T1 - Maple - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto property - Would like to crown reduce to previous pruning points removing up to 2.5mT2 - Maple - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto property - Would like to crown reduce to previous pruning points removing up to 2.5mT5 - Birch - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto property - Would like to reduce lateral branches to provide approx 1.5m clearance to propertyT6 - Maple - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto street light - Would like to crown reduce to previous pruning points removing up to 3mT7 - Maple - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto property - Would like to crown reduce to previous pruning points removing up to 3mT8 - Maple - Located to front of property - Encroaching onto property - Would like to crown reduce to previous pruning points removing up to 3mT9 - Birch - Located to front of property - Moderate Deadwood in crown - Would like to remove moderate deadwoodT10 - Birch - Located to front of property - Low over highway, encroaching onto property - Would like to reduce lateral branches to provide approx 1-5m clearance to property and crown lift pendulous growth over highwayT12 - Birch - Located to front of property - Low over highway, encroaching onto property - Would like to crown lift pendulous growth over highway and over gutters to provide clearance.
